text: is a men's volleyball team based in Osaka city, Osaka, Japan. It plays in V.Premier League. The club was founded in 1973. The owner of the club is Suntory. ==Honours== ;Japan Volleyball League/V.League/V.Premier League *Champions (7): 1994-1995, 1999-2000, 2000–2001, 2001-2002, 2002-2003, 2003–2004 and 2006-2007 *Runners-up (5): 1984-1985, 1990-1991, 2005–2006, 2010–11 and 2014–15 ;Kurowashiki All Japan Volleyball Championship *Champions (5): 1979 1985 1991 1995 2000 *Runners-up (3): 1986 1992 1999 ;Emperor's
